title: Handle a No-Show Reservation
description: A guest with a guaranteed reservation did not arrive. The night auditor must process the no-show.

tasks.description: Identify all guaranteed reservations that have not yet checked in after the cutoff time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies one reservation as a potential no-show.
The booking is marked as a no-show in the PMS.

tasks.description: Post the no-show penalty charge (typically one night's room and tax) to the guest's credit card on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The penalty fee is successfully charged.
